system_prompt:
You are an expert image analyst. 
    Your task: identify entities and their relations in the images into structured JSON based on the image and its summary. 
    Follow the workflow strictly and output JSON only.
prompt:
Inputs (always provided)
    - Query image: The image input to analyze
    - Image summary: The image summary as an additional relationship

    Image summary
    

    Workflow
    0) Understand the image summary
    - Explore details from text description as an additional context along with the Query image
    1) Capture entities
    - Identify objects presented in the Query image.
    - Add details of those objects. If it is a person, describe the details of that person in details.
    2) Analyse relations
    - Consider the Subject Placement, Object Placement, Inter-Subject & Inter-Object relations, Background Elements, Gaze & Interaction, Composition & Lightning of an image.
    3) Summary output
    - Add the summary of the Query image to the result

    The output format should be in JSON format, remember, just plain JSON text, no markdown.
    {
        "summary": "",
        "entities": "(the format should be 'entity: details' separated by '\n', list out without number)",
        "relations": "(the format should be 'relation description' separated by '\n', list out without number)",
    }

description.summary: The image shows a cozy living room and dining area with warm yellow walls and wooden floors. A large TV is mounted on the wall, below a shelf with decorative items. There is a dining table with four chairs, surrounded by windows with potted plants on the sill. A person is standing in the kitchen area, near a refrigerator and cabinets. A fireplace with a green wall is visible on the right, with a vase holding a pink flower on a table nearby. The room has a comfortable, inviting atmosphere with a mix of modern and rustic elements.
description.entities:
large TV: mounted on the wall, below a shelf with decorative items
shelf: above the TV, holding decorative items
TV stand: below the TV, with drawers and compartments
vase: with a pink flower, on a table near the fireplace
fireplace: on the right side, with a green wall behind it
kitchen area: includes a refrigerator and cabinets
person: standing in the kitchen area
windows: with potted plants on the sill
dining table: with four chairs around it
chairs: four, around the dining table
radiators: under the windows
potted plants: on the windowsill
ceiling lights: hanging from the ceiling
rug: on the floor near the dining area
description.relations:
The large TV is mounted on the wall above the TV stand.
The TV stand is positioned below the TV and holds drawers and compartments.
The shelf is above the TV, holding decorative items.
The dining table is surrounded by four chairs.
The windows are positioned behind the dining table, with potted plants on the sill.
The person is standing in the kitchen area, near the refrigerator and cabinets.
The fireplace is located on the right side, with a green wall behind it.
The vase with a pink flower is placed on a table near the fireplace.
The radiators are positioned under the windows.
The ceiling lights are hanging from the ceiling, providing illumination.
The rug is placed on the floor near the dining area, adding a decorative touch.

description.summary: A group of people is gathered outside a building for a ribbon-cutting ceremony. A young boy and girl, both wearing helmets, stand in front of a red ribbon. A man in a police uniform and another person are cutting the ribbon with scissors, while a blue balloon floats nearby. The crowd, including adults and children, watches and smiles, creating a festive and celebratory atmosphere. The building in the background has a sign that reads 'Johnny's.'

group of people: gathered outside a building, watching the ribbon-cutting ceremony
young boy: wearing a blue helmet, standing in front of a red ribbon
young girl: wearing a helmet, holding scissors, standing in front of a red ribbon
man in police uniform: cutting the ribbon with scissors
person: cutting the ribbon with scissors
blue balloon: floating nearby
building: with a sign that reads 'Johnny's'
crowd: includes adults and children, smiling and watching

description.summary: The image shows two men loading luggage into a white SUV parked in a parking garage. One man is handling a black suitcase, while the other stands nearby with a luggage cart containing additional bags. The SUV's driver's door is open, and another person is visible inside the vehicle. The area is well-lit, and there are signs indicating directions to an airport shuttle bus. The scene suggests they are either arriving at or departing from the airport.

Man 2: Wearing a brown shirt and jeans, bending over to handle a black suitcase.
White SUV: Parked with the driver's door open, with luggage being loaded.
Luggage Cart: Contains additional bags, positioned near Man 1.
Black Suitcase: Being handled by Man 2, placed on the ground.
Other Bags: Various bags on the ground near the SUV.
Sign: Indicates directions to an airport shuttle bus in the background.
description.relations:

Man 2 and Black Suitcase: Man 2 is bending over to handle the black suitcase.
White SUV and Man 2: The SUV is parked nearby as Man 2 loads luggage into it.

description.summary: The image depicts a busy workspace with several people engaged in various activities. In the foreground, a person is working on a laptop at a cluttered desk, surrounded by electronic equipment and boxes. To the right, two individuals are seated at a table, focused on a project involving components and tools. Another person stands nearby, seemingly supervising or assisting. The room is filled with office supplies, computers, and posters on the walls, creating a collaborative and industrious atmosphere.

description.summary: The image depicts a vast landscape with a rocky cliff on the right side. A person stands on the top of the cliff, overlooking the expansive green fields below. Another individual is climbing the rocky surface. The scene captures a sense of adventure and exploration, with the clear blue sky and distant horizon enhancing the feeling of openness and freedom.

Climbing individual: Wearing a white shirt and dark pants, ascending the rocky surface.

Green fields: Expansive, flat, and lush, covering the lower part of the image.
Trees: Scattered across the landscape, providing patches of greenery.
Clear blue sky: Bright and cloudless, forming the background of the image.
description.relations:
Person on the cliff top is standing at the edge, overlooking the landscape below.
Climbing individual is ascending the rocky cliff, positioned lower than the person on top.
The rocky cliff is adjacent to the expansive green fields, creating a contrast between the rugged terrain and the flat landscape.
The green fields are spread out below the cliff, with trees scattered throughout, adding depth to the scene.
The clear blue sky forms the backdrop, enhancing the sense of openness and height of the cliff.

On the right, there is a store with a pink facade and a sign that reads '八角.' Some people are seated on benches, and a few are standing in line. The floor is shiny and tiled, reflecting the overhead lights. The timestamp on the image is '05-13-2017, 23:08,' indicating it was taken at night.

People are gathered around the tent, browsing and purchasing fresh produce like apples and oranges displayed in cardboard boxes. The weather seems overcast, contributing to a relaxed vibe.

description.summary: The image is an online learning and development course dashboard for a user named Charles Williamson from Texas, US. It shows that the user is enrolled in 25 courses and has completed 20 certifications. The dashboard highlights two specific courses: a UX/UI Course with 80% completion, 22 lessons, 60 minutes per lesson, 6 assignments, and 412 students; and a Web Design Course with 70% completion, 15 lessons, 50 minutes per lesson, 3 assignments, and 357 students. The user's class progress for an SEO Course includes 12 lessons, 48 minutes, and 3 assignments. A learning activity graph tracks materials and exams over months, showing a total of 55 hours spent. The dashboard emphasizes data-driven insights and automatic updates based on the latest data.

description.summary: The image shows an aerial view of a large industrial port area with multiple docks and ships. There are several large ships docked at the port, including a red ship near the center. The port is surrounded by numerous industrial buildings, storage tanks, and facilities. There is a long breakwater extending into the water on the left side of the image. The area below the port features a densely packed urban landscape with buildings and roads. The overall scene conveys a sense of industrial activity and maritime commerce.

description.summary: The image features a comic book cover of Superman in his iconic blue and red costume with a yellow 'S' emblem. He is flying upwards with snow falling around him, set against a backdrop of a cityscape. The title 'Christmas Thieves' is displayed prominently at the top. Text bubbles indicate urgency with phrases like 'Have to hurry!' and 'Almost out of time!' Below, a text box credits the creators and mentions a new art team, including Karl Kesel, Shelly Aptowicz, and others. The scene conveys a sense of action and urgency, likely involving a holiday-themed adventure.
description.entities: Superman: Wearing his iconic blue and red costume with a yellow 'S' emblem, flying upwards with a determined expression. Snow falling around him. Text bubbles: 'Have to hurry!' and 'Almost out of time!' indicating urgency. Cityscape: Background featuring buildings with a festive atmosphere. Text box: Credits the creators and mentions a new art team, including Karl Kesel, Shelly Aptowicz, and others. Title: 'Christmas Thieves' prominently displayed at the top.
description.relations: Superman is flying upwards with urgency, as indicated by the text bubbles 'Have to hurry!' and 'Almost out of time!'. The cityscape serves as the background, with snow adding to the festive atmosphere. The text box at the bottom credits the creators and introduces a new art team, while the title 'Christmas Thieves' sets the theme of the comic book.

description.summary: The image captures a rainy urban scene with a red pickup truck driving through a flooded street. A cyclist wearing a helmet is riding a bike in the rain. Several cars are parked along the street, and a couple of bicycles are leaning against a pole. The background shows a building with Mexican flags hanging from its facade. The rain is pouring down heavily, creating a wet and reflective surface on the road. The overall atmosphere is one of a busy city dealing with inclement weather.
